content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electronic Circuit Factory at position(9.5, 11.5)
Consists of:
- Input chest at position(6.5, 11.5)
- Burner inserter at position(7.5, 11.5) moving items from input chest to assembling machine
- Assembling machine at position(9.5, 11.5) crafting electronic circuits
- Burner inserter at position(11.5, 11.5) moving products to output chest
- Output chest at position(12.5, 11.5) containing 803 electronic circuits

### Smelting Area
Consists of three stone furnaces:
- Furnace at position(0.0, 0.0)
- Furnace at position(2.0, 0.0)
- Furnace at position(4.0, 4.0)
All furnaces have 5 coal each but no ingredients to smelt

### Power Generation System at position(-7.0, 24.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at position(-9.5, 24.5) producing water
- Pipe network carrying water from pump to boiler
- Boiler at position(-7.0, 24.5) with 9 coal, converting water to steam
- Steam pipe network from boiler
- Steam engine at position(-2.5, 24.5) generating electricity
- Electric pole network distributing power

### Science Pack Processing at position(0.5, 28.5)
Consists of:
- Lab at position(0.5, 28.5) with automation and logistic science packs loaded
- Burner inserter at position(0.5, 30.5) feeding the lab
- Storage chest at position(0.5, 31.5) containing 865 automation science packs and 347 logistic science packs

ERROR TIPS

### Technology Research Prerequisites
- Research prerequisites must be completed in correct order:
  - Engine technology needed before fluid handling
  - Fluid handling needed before oil processing
  - Oil processing needed before plastics
  - Plastics needed before advanced electronics
  - Advanced electronics needed before chemical science pack
  - Chemical science pack needed before advanced material processing 2

### Invalid Technology Names
- Use correct technology names from the Technology enum:
  - "Engine" and "EngineUnit" are invalid names
  - Use proper enum values as defined in the Technology class

### Already Researched Technologies
- Check if technology is already researched before attempting to research:
  - Electronics
  - Electric Energy Distribution
  - Steel Processing
  - Advanced Material Processing
  - Military
  - Logistics 2
  These technologies have already been completed

### Resource Management
- Check inventory before attempting to insert items:
  - Ensure coal is available before trying to insert into boiler
